text: (nabiye!) obata pera api yavana lada sæma dutayekugema, nabivarayekugema kæmættehi seyitan avul viyavul æti kirimata utsaha nokara sitiye næta. (ovunge manasehi) seyitan æti kala væradi adahasa allah paha kala pasu, tamange ayavan (ovunge hrdayanhi) allah sthira kara harinneya. allah siyalla hondin danneku ha gnanavantayeku vasayen sitinneya
